Html:
I'm working on a music player and i want to create a slider for selecting only a channel of the track!

For example... i've got a song with two channel: left chennel is completely different from the right channel!

How can i select to play only one channel scrolling the slider?

 

p.s: i've read this post: "How to output a sound wave to only left or right channel?" but i don't understand... can someone help me?

Thanks in advance

Marco1998
the stereo to mono wave provider provided with NAudio 1.4 should do what you want.

How? i've read the "StereoToMonoProvider16.cs"...

First i must call the fuction  StereoToMonoProvider16 and convert the track

Second i must set the value of the Left/Right Volume

And now? what i must do?
